details.description: Develop responsive visual interfaces according to those proposed by the Interactive Designer and contribute my ideas to what aesthetic and functional point it is possible to carry it out knowing the available tools.
Program flexible software capable of quickly adapting to changes based on new specifications or features.
Audit code of less experienced engineers to verify that the written code respects the SOLID and KISS principles.
Application to facilitate and manage banking processes that were traditionally carried out by staff in a branch for the bank's clients.
Design maintainable, scalable, and reusable software in projects of various scales
Work to solve complex problems using the latest technologies in Mobile, and Web Technologies.
Davinote is a booking and scheduling app that will simplify your scheduling needs and simplify your business.
Turn O'clock is a scheduling app that allows you to take tickets or turns from anywhere and ease the process of waiting.
Sarapp is a lottery application that facilitates lottery ticket sales
CONIAF is a government application that offers documentation, magazines, and news on agricultural and forestry issues.
